product_name: Royal Robbins Pacific Heights Cardigan Sweater - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The women's Royal Robbins Pacific Heights cardigan sweater fits seamlessly into your wardrobe as a lightweight layering piece. Cotton and linen blend together for durable softness your skin will love. V-neck opening and front button placket create a flattering and classic style. 2 angled front pockets with button closure provide storage for small items. Royal Robbins Pacific Heights cardigan details include dolman sleeves and a dropped back hem. Closeout.
short_description: The women's Royal Robbins Pacific Heights cardigan sweater fits seamlessly into your wardrobe as a lightweight layering piece. Cotton and linen blend together for durable softness your skin will love.
